summary: This is an email exchange between a U.S. Department of Justice Attaché in London and an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York regarding the status of conversations with the counsel for a witness identified as 'PA'. The email includes attachments of notes from calls and correspondence with the law firm Blackfords.

persons.name: John
persons.context: Sends an email from London checking on the status of discussions with Blackfords regarding witness PA.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Responds to John's email, providing notes from calls with Blackfords and scheduling a next call regarding witness PA.

connections.person2: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
connections.description: Colleagues within the U.S. Department of Justice coordinating on a case involving witness PA.

events.title: Scheduled call with Blackfords
events.description: A call is scheduled between U.S. prosecutors and the law firm Blackfords regarding witness PA.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The email discusses ongoing conversations with the law firm Blackfords regarding a witness identified as 'PA'.
The correspondence involves U.S. prosecutors from the Southern District of New York and a DOJ Attaché in London.
Notes from calls and email correspondence with Blackfords are attached to the email.
A next call with Blackfords is scheduled for August 19, 2020.
